snippet: Ai Weiwei, the rebellious Chinese artist, said on Wednesday that the authorities had shut down a Web site on which he was streaming video from four live surveillance cameras in his home.
abstract: Ai Weiwei, the rebellious Chinese artist, said on Wednesday that the authorities had shut down a Web site on which he was streaming video from four live surveillance cameras in his home.

headline.main: Ai Weiwei's Self-Surveillance is Shut Down
headline.print_headline: Ai Weiwei Says Web Site Has Been Shut Down
